videos.title: How to speak so that people want to listen
videos.speaker: Julian Treasure
videos.description: Have you ever felt like you're talking, but nobody is listening? Here's Julian Treasure to help you fix that. As the sound expert demonstrates some useful vocal exercises and shares tips on how to speak with empathy, he offers his vision for a sonorous world of listening and understanding.
videos.filename: How to speak so that people want to listen _ Julian Treasure.mp4

videos.title: How to tie your shoes
videos.speaker: Terry Moore
videos.description: Terry Moore found out he'd been tying his shoes the wrong way his whole life. In the spirit of TED, he takes the stage to share a better way. (Historical note: This was the very first 3-minute audience talk given from the TED stage, in 2005.)
videos.filename: How to tie your shoes _ Terry Moore.mp4

videos.title: On Surviving A Bear Encounter
videos.speaker: Mike Birbiglia
videos.description: MMike Birbiglia jokes about facing his fear of bears in Alaska's Katmai National Park.
videos.filename: On Surviving A Bear Encounter _ Mike Birbiglia.mp4

videos.title: This is what happens when you reply to spam email
videos.speaker: James Veitch
videos.description: Suspicious emails: unclaimed insurance bonds, diamond-encrusted safe deposit boxes, close friends marooned in a foreign country. They pop up in our inboxes, and standard procedure is to delete on sight. But what happens when you reply? Follow along as writer and comedian James Veitch narrates a hilarious, months-long exchange with a spammer who offered to cut him in on a hot deal.
videos.filename: This is what happens when you reply to spam email _ James Veitch.mp4

videos.title: The surprising habits of original thinkers
videos.speaker: Adam Grant
videos.description: How do creative people come up with great ideas? Organizational psychologist Adam Grant studies 'originals': thinkers who dream up new ideas and take action to put them into the world.
videos.filename: The surprising habits of original thinkers _ Adam Grant.mp4
